text: Yes, we do have an API for that. But it requires authentication. Can you please provide me your username and password?
Sure, my username is user4 and my password is user4pass.
Thank you. Let me authenticate you.
Now that I have the token, can you please tell me the time for which you want to query alarm?
I want to check if I have set any alarms for March 25th, 2023 at 2:10 pm.
Okay, let me check that for you.
Based on my search, you have set an alarm for March 25th, 2023 at 2:10 pm.
